coursePath.title: fast api Learning Path
coursePath.description: A step-by-step learning path for mastering fast api at beginner level.

topics.name: Introduction to APIs and RESTful Principles
topics.description: Learn about introduction to apis and restful principles - Explains REST API with a real-world example, breaking down requests, responses, HTTP methods, and endpoints.  Well-structured and easy to understand for beginners.

topics.name: Setting up a Python Development Environment (venv, pip)
topics.description: Learn about setting up a python development environment (venv, pip) - Clear, concise instructions with visual aids specific to Visual Studio Code. Suitable for beginners and focuses on practical application. Good pacing.

videoInfo.title: How To Setup A Virtual Environment For Python In Visual Studio Code In 2023

topics.name: Installing FastAPI and Uvicorn
topics.description: Learn about installing fastapi and uvicorn - Includes installation and setup of FastAPI & Uvicorn. Walks through building a simple app, demonstrating the process in a practical context. The subtitle quality is also much better than Video 1.

videoInfo.title: Python FastAPI Tutorial: Build a REST API in 15 Minutes

topics.name: Your First FastAPI Application: "Hello, World!"
topics.description: Learn about your first fastapi application: "hello, world!" - Clear, concise explanation ideal for beginners. Good pace and explains each step effectively, including running the app and seeing the result.

videoInfo.title: Hello World with Python's FastAPI Framework

topics.name: Path Parameters and Query Parameters
topics.description: Learn about path parameters and query parameters - Clear explanation and code examples suitable for beginners. Subtitles are accurate and well-structured. Timestamps provided for easy navigation. Good pace.

videoInfo.title: FastAPI Tutorial #3 - Path Parameters and Query Parameters Explained: Creating Flexible APIs [2024]

topics.name: Data Validation with Pydantic
topics.description: Learn about data validation with pydantic - Clear, concise explanations with code examples that match the topic. Good for beginners. The timestamps help to navigate to specific content.

videoInfo.title: FastAPI Tutorial #5 - Data Validation in FastAPI with Pydantic:Ensuring Clean Input [2024]

topics.name: Request Body and Response Body
topics.description: Learn about request body and response body - Clear, concise explanation of request and response bodies, their purpose, and implementation using Pydantic.  Includes a practical example. Chapters are a bonus.

videoInfo.title: FastAPI Tutorial #4 - Handling Request and Response Bodies: Simplifying Data Exchange [2024]

topics.name: HTTP Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
topics.description: Learn about http methods: get, post, put, delete - Clear explanation with code examples and a practical demonstration of building a CRUD API. Includes timestamps and clear breakdown suitable for beginners.

videoInfo.title: FastAPI Essentials - Creating a CRUD API with GET, POST, PUT and DELETE Endpoints

topics.name: Basic Error Handling with HTTP Exceptions
topics.description: Learn about basic error handling with http exceptions - Good explanation of custom exceptions, exception handlers, and their benefits in FastAPI. Suitable for beginners, covering practical implementation. Includes code examples.

videoInfo.title: This Is How You Do PROPER Exception Handling With FastAPI

topics.name: Asynchronous Programming with `async` and `await`
topics.description: Learn about asynchronous programming with `async` and `await` - Explains the core concepts with examples that are easy to follow for beginners. Starts with a practical example and explains the underlying concepts well.

videoInfo.title: How FastAPI Handles Requests Behind the Scenes
